DEATHKNIGHT_FROST:
Use Power Infusion on the Frost Death Knight when:

  • They are using the Obliteration talent and are in the Obliteration phase.
  • They are using Breath of Sindragosa and the ability’s buff is active.
  • They do not have Obliteration or Breath of Sindragosa and are in their primary damage phase (during Pillar of Frost if they have the talent, or at any time otherwise).
DEATHKNIGHT_UNHOLY:
Use Power Infusion on the Unholy Deathknight when:

  • They are fighting at least 1 enemy and are in a single-target priority phase or expecting persistent adds
  • Their Summon Gargoyle is active with ≤22 seconds remaining, or they use Army of the Dead/Raise Abomination with ≤18 seconds remaining on those summons
  • Dark Transformation is active (if they aren’t using Gargoyle or Army of the Dead talents)
  • They aren’t using Gargoyle and Dark Transformation is active (general case)
  • Their Gargoyle isn’t active and their next Gargoyle summon cooldown won’t overlap with your Power Infusion duration
  • There are ≥3 enemies present and either Dark Transformation is active or Death and Decay is affecting the area
DEMONHUNTER_HAVOC:
Use Power Infusion on the Havoc Demon Hunter when:

  • Their Metamorphosis ability is active during combat.
  • The encounter will end within 20 seconds (to maximize cooldown utilization before the fight concludes).
DRUID_BALANCE:
Use Power Infusion on the Balance Druid when:

  • The Balance Druid activates their primary damage cooldown Celestial Alignment or Incarnation: Chosen of Elune to amplify their burst window.
  • Their rotation aligns with critical phases requiring haste and damage boosts, such as during convoke_the_spirits casts or stacked celestial empowerments.
DRUID_FERAL:
Use Power Infusion on the Feral Druid when:

  • Bloodtalons is active, ensuring their combo point generators benefit from increased damage and haste.
  • The Druid is not using the Berserk: Heart of the Lion talent, as their burst window timing differs from standard Berserk setups.
EVOKER_DEVASTATION:
Use Power Infusion on the Devastation Evoker when:

  • Dragonrage is active and either Shattering Star is on cooldown, the Shattering Star debuff is present, or there are 2 or more enemies.
  • The remaining fight duration is less than 35 seconds.
HUNTER_MARKSMANSHIP:
Use Power Infusion on the Marksmanship Hunter when:

  • They have Trueshot active with over 12 seconds remaining (to maximize cooldown alignment)
  • The encounter will end in under 13 seconds (for final burst window prioritization)
HUNTER_SURVIVAL:
Use Power Infusion on the Survival Hunter when:

  • Their Coordinated Assault is active.
  • They do not have Coordinated Assault and Spearhead is on cooldown.
  • They have neither Coordinated Assault nor Spearhead talents.
MAGE_ARCANE:
Use Power Infusion on the Arcane Mage when:

  • The Mage does not have Spymaster's Web equipped and their last action was Arcane Surge.
  • The Mage has Spymaster's Web equipped and their last action was Evocation.
MAGE_FIRE:
Use Power Infusion on the Fire Mage when:

  • Power Infusion is not already active, and one of the following applies:
  • Combustion will be ready within its prepull preparation window (to align cooldowns).
  • The Mage is already in a Combustion window with more than 7 seconds remaining on the buff.
  • The fight duration is under 20 seconds remaining (to avoid wasting the cooldown).
MAGE_FROST:
Use Power Infusion on the Frost Mage when:

  • Power Infusion is not already active on the target.
  • The Mage is using major cooldowns such as Icy Veins or Rune of Power to maximize burst damage windows.
MONK_WINDWALKER:
Use Power Infusion on the Windwalker Monk when:

  • Xuen the White Tiger is active, and Bloodlust is not active.
  • Xuen the White Tiger is active during Bloodlust, but Strike of the Windlord is available (off cooldown).
PALADIN_RETRIBUTION:
Use Power Infusion on the Retribution Paladin when:

  • the Retribution Paladin has Avenging Wrath active
  • during their Crusade window
  • the target is affected by their Execution Sentence
PRIEST_SHADOW:
Use Power Infusion on the Shadow Priest when:

  • Voidform is active and Power Infusion is not present.
  • Dark Ascension is active alongside an inactive Power Infusion.
  • The Priest has their TWW 2pc/4pc tier set equipped without an active Power Infusion.
ROGUE_ASSASSINATION:
Use Power Infusion on the Assassination Rogue when:

  • The Rogue's Deathmark ability is actively damaging a target (Deathmark is "ticking").
ROGUE_SUBTLETY:
Use Power Infusion on the Subtlety Rogue when:

  • The Rogue has Shadow Dance active, as this cooldown enables their highest-damage stealth abilities and benefits maximally from the haste boost.
SHAMAN_ELEMENTAL:
Use Power Infusion on the Elemental Shaman when:

  • They activate Ascendance, aligning your cooldown with their strongest burst window.
  • Ascendance will not be available within 30 seconds, ensuring optimal usage during alternative high-damage phases.
SHAMAN_ENHANCEMENT:
Use Power Infusion on the Enhancement Shaman when:

  • The Shaman has Ascendance, Feral Spirit, or Doom Winds active.
  • The remaining fight duration is within 20 seconds of a 2-minute interval (e.g., 2:00, 4:00).
  • All of the Shaman's major cooldowns have over 120 seconds remaining.
  • The Shaman has not talented into Ascendance, Feral Spirit, or Doom Winds.
WARLOCK_AFFLICTION:
Use Power Infusion on the Affliction Warlock when:

  • Their major cooldowns, such as Dark Soul: Misery or Summon Darkglare, are active to amplify burst damage phases.
  • They are executing a pre-planned burst window, ensuring alignment with their highest damage-dealing abilities.
  • Their resource generation or damage output is maximized, such as during Unholy Frenzy or critical debuff uptimes on targets.
WARLOCK_DEMONOLOGY:
Use Power Infusion on the Demonology Warlock when:

  • Their Demonic Tyrant summon is imminent and Wild Imps are about to despawn within a short window after its cast.
  • They’ve just cast Hand of Gul’dan or Ruination to maximize damage during the Demonic Tyrant burst phase.
  • Wild Imps will expire before or shortly after the Demonic Tyrant finishes casting, or they have fewer than 2 Soul Shards to ensure optimal resource pooling for the buff duration.
WARLOCK_DESTRUCTION:
Use Power Infusion on the Destruction Warlock when:

  • Their Infernal is already active during a burst window.
  • They do not have the Summon Infernal talent, requiring consistent cooldown usage.
  • The encounter will end before their next Infernal summon, ensuring optimal timing for final damage.
WARRIOR_ARMS:
Use Power Infusion on the Arms Warrior when:

  • Colossus Smash is active on the target and the encounter will last at least 135 seconds.
  • They are in Execute phase (target below 20% health) and Avatar is active.
  • The encounter will end within 25 seconds.
WARRIOR_FURY:
Use Power Infusion on the Fury Warrior when:

  • The Fury Warrior is in their Avatar phase to amplify their burst damage window.
  • The encounter is in the execute phase (target below 20% health) and Avatar is active.
  • The fight will end within 25 seconds to maximize final damage output.
